text: mariyu (o pravakta!) Varilo kondaru ni (matalu) vintunnatlu (natince) varunnaru. Mariyu varu danini artham cesukokunda memu vari hrdayalapai teralu vesi vunnamu mariyu vari cevulaku cevudu pattinci vunnamu. Mariyu varu e adbhuta sanketanni cusina danini visvasincaru. Civaraku varu ni vaddaku vacci, nito vaduladetappudu, varilo satyanni tiraskarincevaru: "Ivi kevalam purvikula kattukathalu matrame!" Ani antaru
